metadata.name: Platform 404
metadata.description:
Stuck in error, day after day,  
Wake up, work, eat, sleep, rinse, and repeat.  
A life of monotony, with no change in sight,  
A longing for something new, a new path to light.

The clock ticks by, as time slowly passes,  
Each day feels like the last, with no new challenges.  
The same four walls, the same sights to see,  
A life without excitement, without mystery.

For life is a journey, not just a routine,  
A journey to be embraced, a journey to be seen.
